title: Contextual Information Utilization Sports Practice Design Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding fundamental principles of sports training and possessing intermediate-level exercise techniques
context.additional_context: Requires content design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing learning tasks that simulate real sports competition scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can design practice tasks incorporating situational information (scores, time, etc.)
Learners can construct training environments that elicit athletes' cognitive-emotional responses to improve performance
Learners can analyze athletes' distance adjustment and skill selection patterns under conditions simulating actual competitions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
